home_page.slogan: Promote the massive adoption of blockchain and iterate to a trust-free future
home_page.section_1_subtitle: Promote the massive adoption of blockchain and iterate to a trust-free future
home_page.section_1_p_1: Itering is a blockchain technology company, established in Singapore,2018.
home_page.section_1_p_2: We focus on the research and development of blockchain infrastructure, especially the cross-chain technology.
home_page.section_1_p_3: At present, we are developing the DARWINIA network based on the Substrate framework, and are committed to building future Internet of tokens. In addition, we continue to explore and research in the fields of NFT and blockchain games. The blockchain game Evolution Land has been launched on the two continents of Ethereum and Tron. In the future, it will become the first important game application in the DARWINIA ecosystem.
home_page.section_2_item_1: Darwinia Network is a cross-chain bridge chain built on Substrate, focusing on the construction of future Internet of tokens, including cross-chain NFT auction market, stablecoins, cross-chain token swap exchange and markets
home_page.section_2_item_2: It supports the development and growth of future internet of tokens by building infrastructure and core applications, and help realizes tokens connected, solving the problems of scalability and isolation of blockchain networks
home_page.section_2_item_3: Different blockchain networks are connected and able to interact with each other where assets can flow freely to realize efficient cross-chain transmission of information and value
home_page.section_3_p_1: Evolution Land is a virtual business blockchain game that supports cross-chain. The game is divided into 26 continents, each of which is deployed on a different blockchain. The governance parameters are set by users autonomously. Users can buy and sell land, mine elements for them through the Apostles, build buildings, and make props.
home_page.section_3_p_2: The apostles can reproduce the inheritance genes of descendants, can upgrade their abilities by upgrading equipment and attributes, and can choose miners, warriors, doctors, musicians and other occupations in the game. Different continents will evolve into different countries, through cross-chain to achieve trade circulation between the mainland countries, war and other gameplay ...
home_page.section_4_item_1_detail: Safe and easy-to-use digital wallet and user entrance, equipped with air-isolated code scanning technology, supporting multi-scene, multi-platform, multi-application information interaction technology
home_page.section_4_item_2_detail: A streamlined online non-standard asset generation tool, through smart contracts, quickly create exclusive custom NFT assets, suitable for game assets tokenized and equity certificates and more applications
home_page.section_6_item_1_title: Itering wins funding from Web3 Foundation
home_page.section_6_item_1_detail: Web3 Foundation announced a new list of W3F Grants for its funding plan. The project Scale submitted by the Darwinia development team Itering(www.Itering.io)…
home_page.section_6_item_2_detail: The recent coronavirus outbreak has a huge impact worldwide and it also caused difficulties and uncertainties to the crypto world. Darwinia …
home_page.section_6_item_3_detail: A portion of the initial supply of the Crab‘s cRING will be distributed to the holders of RING & DOT, they will get cRING (Airdrop) for free...
home_page.section_7_subtitle: Come join us and create a reliable future together
home_page.section_7_detail_1: The team has many senior experts engaged in the development and technical research of the blockchain field, and has participated in the development of many blockchain open source projects including Bitshares, Ethereum, NEO and so on.
home_page.section_7_detail_2: We have maintained cooperation with many companies in the industry and have won web3 foundation grant.
home_page.section_7_detail_3: Our team is located in Singapore, but we have partner companies in Shanghai and Nanjing, China, which can provide multiple jobs.

about_page.about_p_1: Itering is a blockchain technology company, established in Singapore,2018. We focus on the research and development of blockchain infrastructure, especially the cross-chain technology.
about_page.about_p_2: At present, we are developing the DARWINIA network based on the Substrate framework, and are committed to building future Internet of tokens. In addition, we continue to explore and research in the fields of NFT and blockchain games. The blockchain game Evolution Land has been launched on the two continents of Ethereum and Tron. In the future, it will become the first important game application in the DARWINIA ecosystem.
about_page.join_subtitle: Come join us and create a reliable future together
about_page.join_p_1: The team has many senior experts engaged in the development and technical research of the blockchain field, and has participated in the development of many blockchain open source projects including Bitshares, Ethereum, NEO and so on.
about_page.join_p_2: We have maintained cooperation with many companies in the industry and have won web3 foundation grant. Our team is located in Singapore, but we have partner companies in Shanghai and Nanjing, China, which can provide multiple jobs.
about_page.rust_post: Based on the Substrate, use Rust to develop the Darwinia Network (https://github.com/darwinia-network).
about_page.rust_1: 1. Bachelor’s degree in computer or related major;
about_page.rust_2: 2. At least two years of programming experience;
about_page.rust_3: 3. Familiarity Rust. Or familiarity with Golang or C ++, so that you can quickly get started with Rust;
about_page.rust_4: 4. Familiarity with one of the open-source blockchain systems, understand its architecture and core data structure;
about_page.rust_5: 5. Have a strong interest in blockchain-related mechanisms and principles, and have good learning and communication skills.
about_page.rust_bonus_1: Excellent writing and speaking skills in English;
about_page.rust_bonus_2: Knowledge in cryptography, networking or distributed systems;
about_page.rust_bonus_3: Pay attention to new technologies, be passionate about new technologies, and be willing to share;
about_page.rust_bonus_4: Follow the open source community, provide Github account or other technical forum account and personal technical blog.
about_page.go_post: Responsible for the design and selection, development and realization of the back-end scheme of products.
about_page.go_1: 1. Bachelor’s degree in computer or related major;
about_page.go_2: 2. At least two years of development experience;
about_page.go_3: 3. Proficient in Go and related development technology;
about_page.go_4: 4. Able to use Mac/Linux to complete daily work and basic server-related operations, familiar with git;
about_page.go_5: 5. Have good communication and coordination skills, teamwork spirit, and good self-management skills.
about_page.go_bonus_1: Excellent writing and speaking skills in English;
about_page.go_bonus_2: Knowledge in cryptography, networking or distributed systems;
about_page.go_bonus_3: Pay attention to new technologies, be passionate about new technologies, and be willing to share;
about_page.go_bonus_4: Follow the open source community, provide Github account or other technical forum account and personal technical blog.
about_page.frontend_post: Responsible for the design and selection, development and realization of the front-end scheme of products, including wallet, blockchain browser, smart contract, SDK, etc.
about_page.frontend_1: 1. Bachelor’s degree in computer or related major;
about_page.frontend_2: 2. At least two years of development experience;
about_page.frontend_3: 3. Proficient in React and Vue, familiarity with popular frontend frameworks and tool chains;
about_page.frontend_4: 4. Able to combine business and code levels to propose reasonable solutions;
about_page.frontend_5: 5. Have good communication and coordination skills, teamwork spirit, and good self-management skills.
about_page.frontend_bonus_1: Excellent writing and speaking skills in English;
about_page.frontend_bonus_2: Familiarity with blockchain or experience in related development;
about_page.frontend_bonus_3: Pay attention to new technologies, be passionate about new technologies, and be willing to share;
about_page.frontend_bonus_4: Follow the open source community, provide Github account or other technical forum account and personal technical blog.
about_page.test_post_1: 1. 充分理解公司自主研发的区块链/区块链相关应用的产品需求，制定有效的测试方案，设计并维护测试用例、测试数据及测试脚本，对软件发布的全过程进行质量跟踪与风险判断根据产品需求，制定测试计划；
about_page.test_post_2: 2. 善于发现和分析定位问题，进行缺陷跟踪和管理；
about_page.test_post_3: 3. 搭建自动化框架和研发工具提升测试效率，熟练的自动化测试、持续集成、持续交付能力；
about_page.test_post_4: 4. 根据测试计划搭建和维护测试环境，高效地执行测试用例。
about_page.test_1: 1. 计算机或相关专业，本科及以上学历；
about_page.test_3: 3. 熟悉常见的开源测试工具，熟悉java/Python，至少了解一种脚本语言，有自动化测试在项目中落地的经验；
about_page.test_4: 4. 精通服务端测试方法，对数据服务质量有清晰认识优先；
about_page.test_5: 5. 有良好的逻辑分析能力和沟通能力；
about_page.test_6: 6. 有较强的学习能力，积极主动，有责任感，并具备良好的团队合作意识、协调沟通能力及抗压能力。
about_page.tech_post: Read and study paper about blockchain algorithms and cryptography, write paper and conduct technical solution research.
about_page.tech_1: 1. Master or Ph.D. in Mathematics, Cryptography, Computer Science;
about_page.tech_2: 2. Rich experience and deep understanding of cryptography, zero-knowledge proof, MPC, etc.;
about_page.tech_3: 3. Excellent writing and speaking skills in English;
about_page.tech_5: 5. Have good learning and communication skills, and like to solve problems.
about_page.tech_bonus_2: Pay attention to new technologies, be passionate about new technologies, and be willing to share;
about_page.tech_bonus_3: Follow the open source community, provide Github account or other technical forum account and personal technical blog.
about_page.edu_post_1: 1. Work together with engineers to build new technical contents, including documents, tutorials and video screencasts;
about_page.edu_post_2: 2. Dissemination and education of technical solutions.
about_page.edu_2: 2. More than 1 year of actual development experience;
about_page.edu_3: 3. Excellent writing and expression skills, like to spread and share technology;
about_page.edu_4: 4. Eager to learn about and tinker with blockchain technologies;
about_page.edu_5: 5. Excellent writing and speaking skills in English.
about_page.edu_bonus_1: 1-2 years experience in Technical Writing. Provide excerpts of some of the work you wrote;
about_page.edu_bonus_3: Pay attention to new technologies, be passionate about new technologies, and be willing to share;
about_page.edu_bonus_4: Follow the open source community, provide Github account or other technical forum account and personal technical blog.
about_page.oper_post_1: 1. Activities (online/offline)  planning, promotion and analysis and tracking of corresponding data;
about_page.oper_post_2: 2. Community promotion and daily operation, maintenance and management: including content push and dissemination, words management, answering questions, information collection and feedback, etc.;
about_page.oper_post_3: 3. Build ecological partners with business colleagues, maintain good relationships with partners, and promote user growth and brand promotion.
about_page.oper_2: 2. Interested in the blockchain and have experience in operating community;
about_page.oper_3: 3. Excellent learning, communication and execution ability;
about_page.oper_bonus_1: Excellent writing and speaking skills in English;
